page.title: 03SCHOOL ROLL
page.content:
From June 1984 to June 1985 Stoer School's roll rose from 5 to 8 pupils. This may not seem a big increase but if we look back over the last 60 years the school roll shows a dramatic fall in numbers:-
{***************************** {* * {* 1925...............104 * {* 1945................96 * {* 1965................12 * {* 1985.................8 * {* * {*****************************
We think that our school roll will stay about the same in the near future.There is little chance of an increase to the 1925 numbers.It would be a sad day for the Stoer Community if our school was closed.
